# Government Tender Announcement
## Project Title
39903-230574B - Growth Chamber

### Tender Details

* Tender Number: WS4097371571
* Solicitation Number: WS4097371571
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: October 5, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 31, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: October 16, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing

### Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Charlottetown Laboratory is seeking a quotation for custom-made growth chambers. The growth chambers will be used for diagnostic and research testing purposes to propagate full-size plants.

### Key Requirements

* The growth chambers must be designed to replace the existing EGC Tall Height Growth Units, model Q7277.
* The unit must include a one-year standard warranty.
* An annual preventative maintenance service is required.

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Tender Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Prince Edward Island
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notes

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who offered on the previous solicitation. All interested suppliers are invited to submit their quotation.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact Kristelle Leblanc, SPAC/PSPC at [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Attachment

No attachments are available for this tender.
